heading: 2.3 PTR Campfire Chat Wrap-Up
content: It's now time to think about the 2.3 PTR update for Season 9! Blizzard just finished the Season 9 ! Read everything you need to know here! Nightmare Dungeons are getting a revamp in the upcoming Season 9 PTR. The Seasonal Power for Season 9 is Horadric Spells, the Diablo 4 variant of "build-a-bear", featuring Horadric Spell components! Each class will get a new powerful Unique Item and multiple Legendary Aspects revamped to magnify your renowned demon crushing prowess! The following were the highlights of each class. Check the for more detailed information. We hope you enjoy the Season of Belial's Return with the aid of our Season 8 updates. Our focus for Season 8 is to make sure our are always solid with all the new item updates, new features, and mechanic changes. We are also continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
